channel.title: Biography on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi
channel.description: Recent content in Biography on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi

item.title: Elon Musk
item.description: Great read as any biography from Walter Isaacson, it’s a massive volume but it was very enjoyable and fast to read. Love him or hate him, Musk is a very influential individual for our time, and the book unveiled for me several details about the events that made him “Elon”.
